member.summary: The connection string used by the database layer for connection with the database.

member.name: M:Riskmaster.Settings.ColFYSettings.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructor creates collection of all FY settings for desired fy,LOB,OrgEid
member.param: Pass a FY arg if desire to restrict collection to a fiscal year
Pass zero to get settings for all Lines of Business
Pass zero to get settings for all Organizations
member.remarks: To get all Fiscal Years do not pass a FY arg

member.name: M:Riskmaster.Settings.ColFYSettings.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.remarks: This constructor overload lacks FY arg, creates collection with all Fiscal Years for the LOB and OrgEid

member.summary: Save changes in FY settings collection to FISCAL_YEAR and FISCAL_YEAR_PERIOD

ABBREVIATION, reference parameter to store the value
